com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.camera

Class NavigationCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.camera.NavigationCamera

  • public class NavigationCamera
extends java.lang.Object
    Updates the map camera while navigating.

    This class listens to the progress of MapboxNavigation and moves the MapboxMap camera based on the location updates.

    Since:
    0.6.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NavigationCamera(android.view.View view, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap, MapboxNavigation navigation)
      Creates an instance of NavigationCamera.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Getter for current state of tracking.
      void onProgressChange(android.location.Location location, RouteProgress routeProgress)
      Used to update the camera position.
      void resetCameraPosition()
      Enables tracking and moves the camera to the last known location update from the ProgressChangeListener.
      void resume(android.location.Location location)
      Called during rotation.
      void setCameraTrackingLocation(boolean trackingEnabled)
      Setter for whether or not the camera should follow the location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NavigationCamera

        public NavigationCamera(@NonNull
                        android.view.View view,
                        @NonNull
                        com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap,
                        @NonNull
                        MapboxNavigation navigation)
        Creates an instance of NavigationCamera.
        Parameters:
        view - for determining percentage of total screen
        mapboxMap - for moving the camera
        navigation - for listening to location updates
        Since:
        0.6.0

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(com.mapbox.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute route)
        Called when beginning navigation with a route.

        Creates a CameraPosition based on the DirectionsRoute. If the route is null, the ProgressChangeListener is still added so future updates aren't ignored.

        Parameters:
        route - used to create the camera position
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • resume

        public void resume(android.location.Location location)
        Called during rotation. The camera should resume from the last location update, not the beginning of the route.

        Creates a CameraPosition based on the Location. If the route is null, the ProgressChangeListener is still added so future updates aren't ignored.

        Parameters:
        location - used to create the camera position
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • onProgressChange

        public void onProgressChange(android.location.Location location,
                             RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Used to update the camera position.

        Location is also stored in case the user scrolls the map and the camera will eventually need to return to that last location update.

        Parameters:
        location - used to update the camera position
        routeProgress - ignored in this scenario
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • setCameraTrackingLocation

        public void setCameraTrackingLocation(boolean trackingEnabled)
        Setter for whether or not the camera should follow the location.
        Parameters:
        trackingEnabled - true if should track, false if should not
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • isTrackingEnabled

        public boolean isTrackingEnabled()
        Getter for current state of tracking.
        Returns:
        true if tracking, false if not
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • resetCameraPosition

        public void resetCameraPosition()
        Enables tracking and moves the camera to the last known location update from the ProgressChangeListener.
        Since:
        0.6.0
